fields.fieldTitle: What is your hook / headline?

fieldHint.hint1: Create your Hook Headline using:> Killer Headline Scripts > Sales Opener Question Script > Opportunity Switch Headline Scripts

fields.fieldTitle: What is your name?

fieldHint.hint1: "My name is _____."

fields.fieldTitle: What is your role or title as it applies to your audience?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: an author and software developer; a master herbalist, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Why does it make sense for you to talk to them and help them in this area?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: helped literally hundreds of thousands of people around the world set up their websites, write their sales copy, sell their products, and drive traffic online for more than 20 years; now helped thousands of people overcome everything from problematic breakout prone, flaky, dry, cracked, itchy skin into gorgeous glowing skin, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the topic of your product, service, book, etc. in 2-3 words?

fieldHint.hint1: "My topic is _____.

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: for sale by owner, get more clients, book writing, video blogging, dry cleaning, executive coaching, pt testing, fried butter

fields.fieldTitle: Backstory Identity

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: broke college student athlete, new husband.

fields.fieldTitle: Backstory Struggle

fieldHint.hint1: "At the time, I was trying to _________."(VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: (Ex: make money online; sell my two houses, etc.)

fields.fieldTitle: What was something *external* blocking you from your desire?

fieldHint.hint1: "I was struggling with ______." (VERB ending in "ING)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: making only a few dollars a day, and many days I actually lost money; finding a buyer for two houses I owned, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What happened that caused you to finally "hit the wall?"

fieldHint.hint1: "The problem was that _______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Google had changed their algorithms and increased their ad costs; I got a call that I had to be there in 60 days or they would give the job to someone else, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What did "hitting the wall" mean for you here? (NEGATIVE)

fieldHint.hint1: "Hitting the wall in this case meant ________."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: suddenly my little potato gun website was no longer making any money, so I had to   turn it off; if I didn't get those houses sold, I was on the verge of losing out on the opportunity of a lifetime, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: #1 consequence of what hitting the wall meant. (NEGATIVE)

fieldHint.hint1: "And in this case, hitting the wall actually __________."(VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: killed my only source of income; meant I was on the clock to get those houses sold or see my dreams squashed forever, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What was the epiphany "Event" for you?

fieldHint.hint1: "But luckily for me, that's when I _________ and everything changed." (VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: ran into a friend who told me a secret; picked up and read a book; saw a video; had a brainstorm, etc

fields.fieldTitle: What did this epiphany event reveal to you?

fieldHint.hint1: "From this event I discovered all about _________."(VERB ending in "ING")

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: adding upsells to his products; socially engineering a house sale instead of wasting a ton of money on useless ads. etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What did this big "how to reveal" mean to you?

fieldHint.hint1: "Discovering this how to secret meant _______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: all his websites started working again in spite of Google’s increased costs; I could find a buyer without paying 6% to a Realtor, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What did this big "how to reveal" mean to you?

fieldHint.hint1: "Discovering this how to secret meant _______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: all his websites started working again in spite of Google’s increased costs; I'd found a new way to find a buyer without paying 6% to a Realtor, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: The Plan: What was the first thing you planned to do?

fieldHint.hint1: "My plan was to start _______." (VERB ending in :ING:)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: creating sales funnels in other markets that had better potential to make money than the potato gun market; contacting everyone I knew to ask them to help me advertise my house to their friends, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: The Plan: What was the first action you took?

fieldHint.hint1: "So I started _________." (VERB ending in "ING)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: creating funnels and selling products in the weight loss market; making a list of everyone I knew who lived within a 20 mile radius of my house, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: The Plan: What was the next action you took?

fieldHint.hint1: "We then _______." (VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: created and started selling supplements to people who suffered from diabetic neuropathy; started calling those people and letting them know our house was for sale and that we needed their help, etc

fields.fieldTitle: The Plan: What was the final big action you took?

fieldHint.hint1: "After that, we ________." (VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: created funnels in the couponing, dating, and parenting markets, and others; sent everyone a physical flyer with a picture of our house and a stats sheet, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Achievement: What's the bottom line BIG result you got that your target audience is also going to think is cool and want for themselves?

fieldHint.hint1: "In the end, we were able to _______." (VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: 3X (TRIPLE) our Instagram following and 4X (QUADRUPLE) the size of our private Facebook group in less than 60 days!, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Achievement: When the plan came together, what did you decide?

fieldHint.hint1: "We ended up getting so frustrated that we decided to ______. (VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: create a platform that would make it really easy for us to create sales funnels; create a course that taught everything we learned about how to sell multiple houses yourself, no matter what the market conditions, etc.Ex: create a platform that would make it really easy for us to create sales funnels; create a course that taught everything we learned about how to sell multiple houses yourself, no matter what the market conditions, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Achievement: What's the name of the solution you created?

fieldHint.hint1: "We chose to call it _______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: ClickFunnels, Selling Your Home Alone, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Achievement: What amazing, DREAM outcome did you achieve?

fieldHint.hint1: "Though it sounds almost too good to be true, I can now ________." (VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: build in an hour—by myself, without any tech people—what used to take me and my team of 8 guys 6–8 weeks, and these funnels run faster and converted way higher; sell any house without an agent, no matter what the price, neighborhood or market conditions, easier and faster than hiring a broker and paying their outrageous commissions, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's the overall Title / Name of your offer or what you're selling?

fieldHint.hint1: "The Big title / name of my offer is ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: ClickFunnels; Funnel Scripts; Copywriting Secrets; Funnel Hacker Mentor etc.

fields.fieldTitle: How much time does it take to START getting results with your product, service, book, etc.?

fieldHint.hint1: "You can get results in _____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: almost immediately; about an hour; a single afternoon; less than a day; less than a week; less than a couple of weeks; less time than it takes a bake a cake

fields.fieldTitle: WHO is your target niche audience for this offer? (SINGULAR, 2-3 words)

fieldHint.hint1: "My target audience is a / an _____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: a for sale by owner; a business coach; a new author

fields.fieldTitle: How would you describe your typical, ideal customer AND what they want?

fieldHint.hint1: "My idea customer is _____ who wants _____."

fieldHint.hint2: 2 parts: WHO they are plus WHAT they WANT

fieldHint.hint3: Ex: a homeowner who wants to get their house sold; a well qualified executive coach who wants more clients; a novice book author who wants to write a great book

fields.fieldTitle: What is your ideal customer's main pressing need in this area?

fieldHint.hint1: "My customer really (needs to) ____, (but can't) ___"

fieldHint.hint2: Formula: "My customer really needs to ____, but can't ___"

fieldHint.hint3: Ex: needs to sell his house but can't afford the commission; needs more coaching clients, but can't attract new sign ups; needs to write a book, but can't figure out how to get started, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's the main solution your product / service gives your audience on a silver platter?

fieldHint.hint1: My product / service helps you with ______.

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: how to use FREE sites to advertise your house as a "hidden gem"; tools and coaching to help you write a great book, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What NEGATIVE person, thing, or circumstance do they believe is working against them? (OBSTACLE)

fieldHint.hint1: "The biggest OBSTACLE you have to overcome is _____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Brokers who control the inventory of houses with MLS; Traditional marketing makes it very expensive to find coaching clients / sell books

fields.fieldTitle: WHY is this OBSTACLE (above) such a huge deal for your target audience?

fieldHint.hint1: "This obstacle is a HUGE deal for you because _____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: since Agents control inventory, all good buyers work with agents; if you don't already have clients it's very hard to get credibility; it's hard to stand out from the crowd of authors

fields.fieldTitle: HOW does this OBSTACLE (above) hurt them or keep them from getting results they want?

fieldHint.hint1: "This obstacle really HURTS you because it means _____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: most buyers won't see your house because it's not in the MLS; you can't reach enough coaching prospects to build your credibility; you can't get your book published

fields.fieldTitle: What's an idea your target audience believes is true, but is actually completely WRONG? (VERB ending in "ing "

fieldHint.hint1: "Even though it's not true, many people believe _____."

fieldHint.hint2: VERB ending in "ing "

fieldHint.hint3: Ex: Selling your home without an agent is really hard; Getting new coaching clients is really hard; Writng a book is really hard and takes a long time, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: (1 of 5) What is the absolute #1 COOLEST RESULT your target audience gets from your product / service / book?

fieldHint.hint1: "We make it easy to _____!" (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Sell your house for top dollar - no commissions; Establish credibility instantly as a coach with your own well-written book; Write a damn good, unique book you can be proud of

fields.fieldTitle: (2 of 5) What's the 2nd coolest RESULT your solution gives your target audience?

fieldHint.hint1: "We make it easy to _____!" (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Leverage the Internet to advertise your home for sale; Get more client referrals; Write your book without the pain and hassle of other methods

fields.fieldTitle: (3 of 5) What's ANOTHER great RESULT your product or service gets for people?

fieldHint.hint1: "We make it easy to _____!" (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Find a qualified buyer; Differentiate yourself from all other coaches; Get your book done VERY FAST

fields.fieldTitle: (4 of 5) And what is yet another incredible RESULT your product or service gets for people?

fieldHint.hint1: "We make it easy to _____!" (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Negotiate a win/win contract with a buyer; Leverage book in marketing and advertising to get more clients; Write a book you will be PROUD to have people read

fields.fieldTitle: (5 of 5) What is one more awesome RESULT you get FOR your target audience?

fieldHint.hint1: "We make it easy to _____!" (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Get to closing and move on with life; Stop working so hard to find new coaching clients and have your pick of the best students; Have fun and enjoy the book creation process

fields.fieldTitle: (1 of 3) What's the #1 biggest reason your target audience should act on this now?

fieldHint.hint1: "You should act right now because _____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: The Rules of real estate have changed and the Internet makes it possible to sell without an agent; You need a way to quickly set yourself apart from competition and a book is the best way

fields.fieldTitle: (2 of 3) What's another really important thought about why now is the best time for them to take action?

fieldHint.hint1: "You should act right now because _____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: You don't need agent or the MLS to find a good, qualified buyer anymore; Your own good, unique book is the #1 way create instant credibility in business in today's market

fields.fieldTitle: (3 of 3) What's one last big reason why your audience should act now?

fieldHint.hint1: "You should act right now because _____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: The Internet and other tools & websites make it easier than ever to find buyers; The 27 Day Book.com process, tools, software and coaching make it simple and easy to get your book done NOW!

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #1: What's the Title / Name of this first part of your offer?

fieldHint.hint1: If you need help with a cool title, use the  Profitable Title Script

fieldHint.hint2: "The title / name of this part of my offer is ______."

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #1: What is this? (1-3 words)

fieldHint.hint1: "This is a / an ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: software program, course, training, one-on-one coaching, etc

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #1: What's the monetary Value of this first part of your offer?

fieldHint.hint1: "The value of this first part of my offer is ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: $97, etc

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #1: What does this first offer piece do for them?

fieldHint.hint1: "This makes it easy for you to ______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: research your niche audience super fast; learn to write great classified ads; create the ultimate speaker one-sheet; emergency fitness training routine, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #1: What is the BENEFIT of this feature (above)?

fieldHint.hint1: "This makes it so you can _______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: get inside their minds quickly; generate tons of buyer leads this weekend; instantly set yourself apart from every other speaker they're considering; reach passing levels for your test in a month or less, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #1: What do this feature & benefit together MEAN to them in their life, business, goals, etc.? (connect to an EMOTIONALLY charged payoff)

fieldHint.hint1: "This means you will finally be able to _______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: reach even the most outrageous sales goals faster than you ever dreamed possible; sell your house and get on with your life; sell more from the back of the room and give your family the lifestyle they deserve; land the dream job you always wanted, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #2: What's the Title / Name of this second part of your offer?

fieldHint.hint1: If you need help with a cool title, use the  Profitable Title Script

fieldHint.hint2: "The title / name of this part of my offer is ______."

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #2: What is this? (1-3 words)

fieldHint.hint1: "This is a / an ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: software program, course, training, one-on-one coaching, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #2: What's the monetary Value of this second part of your offer?

fieldHint.hint1: "The value of this first part of my offer is ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: $97, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #2: What does this second offer piece do for them?

fieldHint.hint1: "This makes it easy for you to ______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: get off to a fast start with Instagram using hashtags; negotiate win-win contracts with nervous buyers; learn to creat the ultimate presentation to sell; know what to eat and drink before, during and after the fitness test, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #2: What is the BENEFIT of this feature (above)?

fieldHint.hint1: "This makes it so you can _______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: generate targeted traffic quickly; avoid having a deal blow up in you face; make a ton of sales no matter how resistant the audience; instantly have the best energy levels for high performance, etc

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #2: What do this feature & benefit together MEAN to them in their life, business, goals, etc.? (connect to an EMOTIONALLY charged payoff)

fieldHint.hint1: "This means you will finally be able to _______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: stop wasting money and time on traffic sources that don't work; get to closing in one piece; make every speech a potential gold mine; stand out as a top performer, especially at promotion time, etc

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #3: What's the Title / Name of this third part of your offer?

fieldHint.hint1: If you need help with a cool title, use the  Profitable Title Script

fieldHint.hint2: "The title / name of this part of my offer is ______."

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #3: What is this? (1-3 words)

fieldHint.hint1: "This is a / an ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: software program, course, training, one-on-one coaching, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #3: What's the monetary Value of this third part of your offer?

fieldHint.hint1: "The value of this first part of my offer is ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: $97, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #3: What does this third offer piece do for them?

fieldHint.hint1: "This makes it easy for you to ______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: instantly research all the hashtags for your niche on Instagram and Twitter; "Set the stage" for KILLER Showings to buyers; create order forms that sell "subconsciously"; learn the best way for your body to transition from one test to another, etc

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #3: What is the BENEFIT of this feature (above)?

fieldHint.hint1: "This makes it so you can _______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: find all the most popular hashtags as well has hidden gem hashtags your competitors are missing; put up the best first impression every time; use your handouts to make more money; reach peak efficiency and maximize your score, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Offer Piece #3: What do this feature & benefit together MEAN to them in their life, business, goals, etc.? (connect to an EMOTIONALLY charged payoff)

fieldHint.hint1: "This means you will finally be able to _______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: literally save HUNDREDS of hours of research time you'll now be able to spend with your family instead; sell your house faster than the one down the street; enjoy the highest closing rate of any speaker; feel confident you'll ace any PT test... any time!, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: BONUS Piece #1: What's the Title / Name of this first part of your Bonus Offer?

fieldHint.hint1: If you need help with a cool title, use the  Profitable Title Script

fieldHint.hint2: "The title / name of this part of my offer is ______."

fieldHint.hint3: Ex: The Insiders Guide to Double Your Social Media Followers In 30 Days, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Bonus Piece #1: What is this? (1-3 words)

fieldHint.hint1: "This is a / an ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: software program, course, training, one-on-one coaching, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Bonus Piece #1: What's the monetary Value of this first Bonus Piece?

fieldHint.hint1: "The value of this first Bonus Piece is ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: $97, etc

fields.fieldTitle: Bonus Piece #1: What does this first Bonus Piece do for them?

fieldHint.hint1: "This makes it easy for you to ______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: build up your social media following fast; build a team of professionals to help you get your house sold; Learn 5 openers that instantly grab attention; specific ways to train smarter (not harder), etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Bonus Piece #1: What is the BENEFIT of this feature (above)?

fieldHint.hint1: "This makes it so you can _______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: reach a LOT more people with every post; have lawyers and bankers begging to help you; keep your audience's attention through the close; drop your mile pace, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Bonus Piece #1: What do this feature & benefit together MEAN to them in their life, business, goals, etc.? (connect to an EMOTIONALLY charged payoff)

fieldHint.hint1: "This means you will finally be able to _______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: make a lot more money and have a greater impact on the world; leverage the work of others to get your home sold; help a LOT more people sign up for your offers; avoid injuries that could derail your career, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: BONUS Piece #2: What's the Title / Name of this second part of your Bonus Offer?

fieldHint.hint1: If you need help with a cool title, use the  Profitable Title Script

fieldHint.hint2: "The title / name of this part of my offer is ______."

fieldHint.hint3: Ex: 50 Money Making Tweet Templates, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Bonus Piece #2: What is this? (1-3 words)

fieldHint.hint1: "This is a / an ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: software program, course, training, one-on-one coaching, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Bonus Piece #2: What's the monetary Value of this second Bonus Piece?

fieldHint.hint1: "The value of this first Bonus Piece is ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: $97, etc

fields.fieldTitle: Bonus Piece #2: What does this second Bonus Piece do for them?

fieldHint.hint1: "This makes it easy for you to ______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: build up your social media following fast; build a team of professionals to help you get your house sold; Learn 5 openers that instantly grab attention; specific ways to train smarter (not harder), etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Bonus Piece #2: What is the BENEFIT of this feature (above)?

fieldHint.hint1: "This makes it so you can _______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: tweet every day in less than 60 seconds; leverage social media to find all the buyer you need; avoid the humiliation of begging for speaking gigs; prevent bad results on your PT test, etc

fields.fieldTitle: Bonus Piece #2: What do this feature & benefit together MEAN to them in their life, business, goals, etc.? (connect to an EMOTIONALLY charged payoff)

fieldHint.hint1: "This means you will finally be able to _______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: leverage Twitter to make more sales and enjoy more free time off; know you're using every tool possible to find a buyer; keep your speaking calendar as full as you want it to be; enjoy an exemplary record for every promotion board, etc

fieldHint.hint3: Ex: 50 Money Making Tweet Templates, etc.

fieldHint.hint1: "This is a / an ______."

fields.fieldTitle: Bonus Piece #3: What's the monetary Value of this third Bonus Piece?

fieldHint.hint1: "The value of this first Bonus Piece is ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: $97, etc

fields.fieldTitle: Bonus Piece #3: What does this third Bonus Piece do for them?

fieldHint.hint1: "This makes it easy for you to ______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: build up your social media following fast; build a team of professionals to help you get your house sold; Learn 5 openers that instantly grab attention; specific ways to train smarter (not harder), etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Bonus Piece #3: What is the BENEFIT of this feature (above)?

fieldHint.hint1: "This makes it so you can _______." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: tweet every day in less than 60 seconds; leverage social media to find all the buyer you need; avoid the humiliation of begging for speaking gigs; prevent bad results on your PT test, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Bonus Piece #3: What do this feature & benefit together MEAN to them in their life, business, goals, etc.? (connect to an EMOTIONALLY charged payoff)

fieldHint.hint1: "This means you will finally be able to _______." (Starts with a VERB)

fields.fieldTitle: What's the total value of all your offer parts and bonuses added up?

fieldHint.hint1: "The total value of this offer is _____."

fields.fieldTitle: What is their price when they buy today?

fieldHint.hint1: "Today your price is _____."

fields.fieldTitle: How much does your product, service, software, book, etc. cost as a comparison to something else?

fieldHint.hint1: "My product / service is _____." (NOT a bottom-line dollar figure)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: absolutely ZERO cost to you; less than a dollar a day; less than the cost of an everything pizza; less than the cost of a fancy dinner out on the town, etc.
